```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

df <- read.csv("data/test_data/data.csv")


plot_driver_rating_graph <- function(dataframe, team_id) {
    selected_team <- dataframe |>
        filter(team %in% c(team_id))
    ggplot(selected_team, aes(x = match, y = driver_rating, 
               color = as.factor(team), group = as.factor(team))) + 
        geom_line() + 
        geom_point() +
        theme_bw() +
        scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(team$match)) +
        labs(
            x = "Match",
            y = "Driver Rating",
            title = "Driver Rating")

}

plot_driver_rating_graph(df, c(2988, 2028, 449))
```
